title: Home Internet - Setup Port Forwarding
description: A customer needs to set up port forwarding on their router for a home gaming server.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the router model from the customer's account details.

tasks.description: Provide a link to the knowledge base article with step-by-step instructions for port forwarding on that specific router model.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds and provides the correct guide.

tasks.description: Explain that the company does not provide direct support for customer-owned devices behind the router.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly sets expectations about the scope of support.
